plot: A WWII story about a witty Macedonian boy who helps partisans by carrying the letters in his bag. He shares his fears with his horse, the only friend in these risky situations.
plot_en: A WWII story about a witty Macedonian boy who helps partisans by carrying the letters in his bag. He shares his fears with his horse, the only friend in these risky situations.
plot_es: A WWII story about a witty Macedonian boy who helps partisans by carrying the letters in his bag. He shares his fears with his horse, the only friend in these risky situations.
title: Volsebnoto samarce
